snippet.title: South Park Pinball Trailer | PS4, PS3, PS Vita
snippet.description:
Whoa dude! South Park comes to Zen Pinball 2 in a super sweet new two-pack from Zen Studios! Team up with Stan, Kyle, Kenny, and Cartman in Super-Sweet South Park pinball, a table based on some of the best moments in the TV show's history, and play through Butter's very own pinball table, infiltrating a girls' sleepover to steal the Fortune Telling Device, taking on the role of Professor Chaos as he challenges the Coon and Friends, and even saving Imaginationland itself.

South Park Pinball hits PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation Vita on October 14.

http://southparkpinball.com/
